displayName: Disable Microsoft Identity Security Defaults Enforcement Policy
rationale: Legacy authentication protocols do not support multi-factor authentication. These protocols are often used by attackers because of this deficiency. Blocking legacy authentication makes it harder for attackers to gain access.
recommended_action: Disable the Identity Security Defaults Enforcement Policy
error_message: Identity Security Defaults Enforcement Policy should be disabled to allow MFA to work
ruleNames: Disable Microsoft Identity Security Defaults Enforcement Policy to ensure policy blocks legacy access
